snippet: Miami's LeBron James, wearing a protective mask to shield his broken nose, plundered a career-high 61 points in the Heat's 124-107 victory over the Charlotte Bobcats on Monday....

headline.print_headline: Masked Man James Scores 61 Against Bobcats
headline.main: Masked Man James Scores 61 Against Bobcats

lead_paragraph: Miami's LeBron James, wearing a protective mask to shield his broken nose, plundered a career-high 61 points in the Heat's 124-107 victory over the Charlotte Bobcats on Monday.
